title: Мир после
overview: The pandemic turned the whole world upside down, and no one could even guess the scale of the changes. Coronavirus is not just a medical problem. This is a huge challenge to our civilization. One of the greatest stresses in the history of mankind, for several months trapped in their homes.We are facing unprecedented challenges in interpersonal relations, social life, economics and politics. Let's find out what happened and what conclusions we can draw for ourselves.In this documentary series IVI Originals, the best journalists will meet with famous people in Russia and abroad: scientists, politicians, prominent economists, artists, religious figures and philosophers. The purpose of the interview is to understand all that is happening to humanity and to understand what lessons the whole world is learning: international organizations, governments, companies and ordinary people. What will our reality look like in the coming years, after the pandemic? What can each of us learn from all these lessons? Leading speakers in the documentary series "The World After"will try to answer the most relevant and exciting questions.
